span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示专用 C14N XML 规范化转换，并提供备注。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform with comments. 此类是类似于类，该类允许签名者可以创建使用 XML 文档的规范格式的摘要。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 但是，类排除上级上下文从规范化子文档。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 使用类需要进行规范化 XML 时子文档，以便它独立于其 XML 上下文。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如，应用程序如使用的 Web 服务中复杂通信协议签名 XML 通常需要这种方式规范化 XML。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 此类应用程序通常信封各种动态构造的元素，其可显著更改该文档并导致 XML 签名验证失败中的 XML。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 类从规范子文档中排除此类上级上下文，从而解决了此问题。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 请注意，你不能直接创建规范化转换类的新实例。Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定规范化转换，请将传递描述到转换的统一资源标识符 (URI)属性，它是可从访问属性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取的规范化转换的引用，使用属性，它是可从访问属性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 用于描述的 URI类定义由字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关专用 C14N 转换的详细信息，请参阅 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. W3C 规范 XML 规范，位于 www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n 中定义的规范化算法。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何进行签名和验证 XML 文档使用类。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class. 此示例创建一个封装签名。This example creates an envelope signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`参数包含空格分隔的使用标准的规范化算法，而不是专用规范化算法来规范化的命名空间前缀列表。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a whitespace-delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定默认命名空间，没有前缀，传递的特殊前缀"#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".
